companyInfo.Competitors: Axiom Global, FLEX by Fenwick, RGP

jobDescription: Paragon Legal, the premier alternative legal services firm, is currently looking for a senior corporate paralegal for a project with an exciting technology company in Redwood City.  We specialize in technology and commercial transactions, corporate, employment and IP for clients such as Facebook, Autodesk, and Square. Working either on-site or remotely, our paralegals assist with ongoing overflow work and help with special projects.  To join our team, the ideal paralegal will have the following: 5+ years of experience handling corporate matters in-house or at a law firm;BA or equivalent four-year post-secondary degree;Paralegal Certificate;Solid written and verbal skills;Strong organizational skills;Knowledge of US and state securities laws and reporting; andExperience establishing and maintaining corporate entities. If this sounds like you, please contact us and we will be in touch. Please indicate on the application form which source you applied through. We look forward to hearing from you! Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.
